org.mozilla.geckoview

Class StorageController

  • Object
    • org.mozilla.geckoview.StorageController

  • public final class StorageController
extends Object
    Manage and control runtime storage data. Retrieve an instance via GeckoRuntime.getStorageController().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      StorageController()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void clearAllSessionContextData()
      Clear all browser storage data like cookies and localStorage.
      void clearSessionContextData(String contextId)
      Clear all browser storage data like cookies and localStorage for the given context.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageController

        public StorageController()

    • Method Detail

      • clearSessionContextData

        @AnyThread
public void clearSessionContextData(@NonNull
                                               String contextId)
        Clear all browser storage data like cookies and localStorage for the given context. Note: Any open session may re-accumulate previously cleared data. To ensure that no persistent data is left behind, you need to close all sessions for the given context prior to clearing data.
        Parameters:
        contextId - The context ID for the storage data to be deleted. For null, all storage data will be cleared.

      • clearAllSessionContextData

        @AnyThread
public void clearAllSessionContextData()
        Clear all browser storage data like cookies and localStorage. Note: Any open session may re-accumulate previously cleared data. To ensure that no persistent data is left behind, you need to close all sessions prior to clearing data.
